Articles.Content:
Been lurking here for a couple of months, and up till now I was just reading and learning.

One of the things I read on the list of suggested features is "mission creation", perhaps in a new planning centre. Well my suggestion would be that this centre would (also) be used, to review prior flights. Maybe even look at a simulation with some extra data displayed. But at least show some trajectories. There's probably more that can be done with this feature that I can''t think of right now.

I thought of it while my brother was trying to explain what kind of mission he had done and I kept asking questions he didn't know the answer to
